events.message: We received the application from the candidate for the software engineer position yesterday morning.
The application was reviewed and categorized as an engineering role focusing on software development.
A recruiter specialized in engineering roles has been assigned to manage this candidateâ€™s hiring process.
The initial phone screening went well, and the candidate demonstrated strong software engineering knowledge.
Candidate responded promptly to the screening feedback and expressed enthusiasm to proceed to technical interviews.
The technical interview has been successfully scheduled for the candidate next Tuesday at 3 PM.
The candidate completed the technical interview and demonstrated excellent problem-solving skills with code.
Following the successful technical round, an HR interview has been scheduled to discuss culture fit.
The HR interview went positively, with the candidate showing great alignment with company values.
An offer has been formally proposed to the candidate including competitive salary and benefits.
Candidate gave positive feedback on the offer terms and expressed eagerness to join the team.
The candidate has officially accepted the offer and is excited to start working as a software engineer.
The onboarding process has started successfully, and the new engineer is completing all initial documentation.
The recruitment case has been closed after the new software engineer joined and completed onboarding.
